label: Sideload conversation
tooltip: This will sideload a conversation into an already running conversation. Useful for having a top level conversation that loads others based on high level conditions. Important: Its recommeneded you set this action on Responses. If you set on a Prompt node then the following Response might not evaluate its condition but it will work for sideloading.

inputs.label: Entry Node Id
inputs.tooltip: The Prompt / Response node to sideload directly into the conversation on. If left blank then it will enter the conversation like normal (and evalute all conditions on root nodes).

inputs.label: Resume host after sideload finished
inputs.tooltip: This setting can allow the conversation to resume from this point after the sideloaded conversation has finished.

values.viewlabel: and resume the host conversation on finish
